description:
This is the "Purity" decal for your Arsenal that uses calligraphy from calligrapher Souun Takeda.

The in-game design does not contain Mr. Souun's signature.
A copy of "DAEMON X MACHINA" will be required to use this content.
This content is purely cosmetic, and using this will not have any status changes.
name: Arsenal Decal "Purity"
